Class DesktopStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • DesktopStub
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.applet.AppletStub

    class DesktopStub
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.applet.AppletStub
    An implementation of AppletStub, optimized for desktop apps. It's not complete though, only the methods needed by Nfm2 are implemented.
